bs-reminder-extension-description: Gives the user the opportunity to create reminders.
bs-reminder-pref-DefaultReminderPeriod-h: Enter number of days for the reminder period.
bs-reminder-unknown-page-msg: You are trying to create a reminder for a page which doesn't exist.
bs-reminder-unknown-user-msg: You are trying to create a reminder for a user which doesn't exist.
bs-reminder-illegal-date-msg: You are trying to create a reminder for a date which is before current date
bs-reminder-create-success: Your reminder has been created successfully.
bs-reminder-create-error: Your reminder could not yet be created. Please try again.
bs-reminder-update-success: Your reminder has been updated successfully.
bs-reminder-update-error: Your reminder could not yet be updated. Please try again.
bs-reminder-text-delete: Do you really want to delete {{PLURAL:$1|this reminder|these $1 reminders}}?
bs-reminder-error-valid-reminder: You are trying to delete an invalid reminder.
bs-reminder-error-owner-reminder: You can only delete your own reminders.
bs-reminder-delete-success: The reminder has been deleted successfully.
bs-reminder-create-no-actions: Some parameters are missing. Please try again.
bs-reminder-save-success: The Reminder has been created successfully.
bs-reminder-other-user-not-allowed: You are not allowed to assign reminders to another user
bs-reminder-pref-DisableReminderForNS: Do not create reminder for the following namespaces:
bs-reminder-privacy-transparency-working: BlueSpiceReminder: Reminder for page $1 on $2 with comment: $3
apihelp-bs-reminder-store-summary: Provides a store for reminders, that can be queried
apihelp-bs-reminder-tasks-summary: Provides tasks such as editing or deleting reminders
bs-reminder-start-date-greater-end-date: Reminder end date can't be set before the start date
bs-reminder-event-today: Your reminder for page [$1 $2] is due today
bs-reminder-event-today-with-comment:
Your reminder for page [$1 $2] is due today.

Comment on the reminder:
$3
bs-reminder-event-one-week: Your reminder for page [$1 $2] is due in one week
bs-reminder-event-one-week-with-comment:
Your reminder for page [$1 $2] is due in one week.

Comment on the reminder:
$3
